column2: Plexus Corp. engages in the provision of electronic manufacturing services. The company is headquartered in Neenah, Wisconsin and currently employs 19,000 full-time employees. The firm delivers end-to-end solutions for customers in the Americas (AMER), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA) and Asia-Pacific (APAC) regions. The firm's segments are AMER, APAC and EMEA. The firm's customer-focused solutions model integrates product conceptualization, design, commercialization, manufacturing, fulfillment and sustaining solutions. The firm delivers solutions to its customers through its product realization value stream. The firm provides a range of aftermarket services, including complex repair, refurbishment and product support for products it manufactures. The firm provides customer service to approximately 140 branded product companies in the healthcare/life sciences, industrial/commercial, networking/communications and defense/security/aerospace market sectors.
